name: Initial Rescissions Of Harmful Executive Orders And Actions
summary: Rescinds 78 Biden Administration executive orders and memoranda (~1/2 of Biden's EOs). Obviously too many to summarize.
notes: Gives 1-2 months for departments to review and make sure that nothing here would cause the country to shut down or something.

name: Restoring Freedom Of Speech And Ending Federal Censorship
summary: No federal employee should abridge free speech under the guise of combating misinformation. Also requires a report on previous censorship.
notes: Theoretically immediate but it's hard to interpret what this means for most federal employees.

name: Ending The Weaponization Of The Federal Government
summary: Reviews whether the previous administration weaponized the justice department and intelligence community against political opponents.
notes: Justice Department will probably get started soon.

name: Return to In-Person Work
summary: Return to in-person work for federal employees.
notes: Might take a few months for departments to actually implement this. Employees must be given time to relocate, etc.

name: Regulatory Freeze Pending Review
summary: Freezes new rules from federal agencies unless reviewed by new administration department heads.
notes: Immediate. Likely will get retracted within a couple months. Similar to a 'hiring freeze' but for regulations.

name: Hiring Freeze
summary: Instructs OMB to reduce the size of the federal workforce through efficiency improvements and attrition.
notes: Immediate. Will probably go on for several months.

name: Delivering Emergency Price Relief for American Families and Defeating the Cost-of-Living Crisis
summary: Directs departments to take measures to lower costs for Americans.
notes: Unclear how this will be implemented.

name: Putting America First In International Environmental Agreements
summary: Withdraws the US from the Paris Agreement.
notes: Immediate effect.

name: Granting Pardons And Commutation Of Sentences For Certain Offenses Relating To The Events At Or Near The United States Capitol On January 6, 2021
summary: Pardons many individuals convicted for Jan 6th–related offenses.
notes: Immediate effect.

name: Application Of Protecting Americans From Foreign Adversary Controlled Applications Act To TikTok
summary: Delays the TikTok ban for 75 days.
notes: Immediate, but effectively punts the issue for 75 days.

name: Withdrawing The United States From The World Health Organization
summary: Withdraws the US from the WHO.
notes: Immediate in principle, but disentangling is complex.

name: Restoring Accountability To Policy-Influencing Positions Within the Federal Workforce
summary: Makes it easier to fire federal employees in policy roles.
notes: Already sued over this by a federal union.

lawsuits.caseName: National Treasury Employees Union v. Trump et al.
lawsuits.description: Union lawsuit challenging new firing rules.

lawsuits.caseName: Public Employees for Environmental Responsibility v. Trump et al.
lawsuits.description: Union lawsuit challenging new firing rules.

name: Holding Former Government Officials Accountable For Election Interference And Improper Disclosure Of Sensitive Governmental Information
summary: Revokes security clearances from certain individuals.
notes: Probably immediate. Some individuals might sue.

name: Declaring A National Emergency At The Southern Border Of The United States
summary: Directs the military to prepare to assist at the southern border.
notes: Secretary of Defense will begin soon.

name: Memorandum to Resolve the Backlog of Security Clearances for Executive Office of the President Personnel
summary: Expedites security clearances for new appointees.
notes: Immediate effect.

name: America First Trade Policy
summary: Directs new tariffs, investigations, and potential changes to unfair trade practices.
notes: Will take time for departments to implement. Potential logistical hurdles.

name: Clarifying The Military’s Role In Protecting The Territorial Integrity Of The United States
summary: Directs the military to develop a plan to seal the borders.
notes: Plan due within a month.

name: Unleashing American Energy
summary: Removes regulatory barriers for energy production, ends the Climate Corps, and pauses certain green initiatives.
notes: Likely takes a year to roll out fully. Many separate actions across agencies.

name: Realigning the United States Refugee Admissions Program
summary: Pauses all refugee admissions.
notes: Immediate effect.

name: Protecting The Meaning And Value Of American Citizenship
summary: Ends birthright citizenship.
notes: Widely expected to be blocked (>90% on prediction markets). Likely declared unconstitutional.

lawsuits.caseName: State of Washington et al. v. Trump et al.
Doe et al. v. Trump et al.
State of New Jersey et al. v. Trump et al.
New Hampshire Indonesian Community Support et al. v. Trump et al.
Casa, Inc. et al. v. Trump et al.

name: Securing Our Borders
summary: Directs construction of the border wall, ends CBP One, adopts other enforcement policies.
notes: Will take time to roll out all these changes.

name: Putting People Over Fish: Stopping Radical Environmentalism to Provide Water to Southern California
summary: Works to re-route water in Southern California.
notes: Likely still subject to a previous lawsuit from the last administration.

lawsuits.description: Old lawsuit concerning water rights in SoCal.

name: Restoring The Death Penalty And Protecting Public Safety
summary: Restores federal capital punishment.
notes: Fairly immediate.

name: Promoting Beautiful Federal Civic Architecture
summary: Encourages return to classical architecture for new federal buildings.
notes: Likely logistical challenges given long planning cycles for construction.

name: Restoring Accountability for Career Senior Executives
summary: Gives greater executive control over the career senior executive service workforce.
notes: Fairly immediate.

name: Declaring a National Energy Emergency
summary: Directs departments to expedite energy and natural resource projects.
notes: Likely to face lawsuits on specific projects. Implementation will take months.

name: Reevaluating And Realigning United States Foreign Aid
summary: Pauses disbursement of foreign aid, orders a review to align aid with current US policy.
notes: Immediate pause, broader changes will roll out in coming months.

name: Organization of the National Security Council and Subcommittees
summary: Reorganizes the National Security Council.
notes: Fairly immediate.

name: The Organization for Economic Co-operation and Development (OECD) Global Tax Deal (Global Tax Deal)
summary: Withdraws the US from the OECD Global Tax Deal.
notes: Fairly immediate withdrawal.

name: Protecting The American People Against Invasion
summary: Establishes task forces to target cartels, mandates increased detentions, denies public benefits to illegal aliens.
notes: Will likely take several months to implement.

name: Unleashing Alaska’s Extraordinary Resource Potential
summary: Expands permitting for energy and development projects in Alaska.
notes: Likely rapid action, but lawsuits are expected.

name: Protecting The United States From Foreign Terrorists And Other National Security And Public Safety Threats
summary: Enhanced vetting/screening of foreign nationals, potentially partial bans from certain nations.
notes: Will take a couple months to roll out fully.

name: America First Policy Directive To The Secretary Of State
summary: Aligns foreign policy with 'America First' principles.
notes: Immediate effect.

name: Establishing And Implementing The President’s “Department Of Government Efficiency”
summary: Creates DOGE to improve software and processes across agencies. Every agency must establish a small DOGE team.
notes: Likely will take a couple months to set up, but it's already getting started.

name: Defending Women From Gender Ideology Extremism And Restoring Biological Truth To The Federal Government
summary: Defines sex as biological sex, eliminates the concept of gender identity in federal programs.
notes: Implementation is unclear.

lawsuits.caseName: PFLAG, Inc. et al. v. Trump et al.

name: Ending Radical And Wasteful Government DEI Programs And Preferencing
summary: Eliminates federal DEI programs, terminates any DEI roles.
notes: Likely takes a couple weeks to roll out. Reports indicate it's already underway.

lawsuits.caseName: National Association of Diversity Officers in Higher Education et al. v. Trump et al.

name: Reforming The Federal Hiring Process And Restoring Merit To Government Service
summary: Directs creation of a federal hiring plan based on merit, reduces time-to-hire, modernizes HR technology.
notes: Will take up to 6 months to create the plan (overlaps with the hiring freeze).

name: Designating Cartels And Other Organizations As Foreign Terrorist Organizations And Specially Designated Global Terrorists
summary: Begins process of designating certain drug cartels as terrorist organizations.
notes: Likely takes a few months to implement fully.

name: Restoring Names That Honor American Greatness
summary: Renames geographic sites (e.g. Mt. Denali to Mt. McKinley). Possibly more changes to come.
notes: Immediate effect, with further steps likely.

name: Guaranteeing The States Protection Against Invasion
summary: Seals the southern border from illegal crossings.
notes: Fairly immediate action.

name: Keeping Americans Safe in Aviation
summary: Mandates the FAA to review and eliminate DEI initiatives and hiring.
notes: Likely a few months to implement.

name: Ending Illegal Discrimination And Restoring Merit-Based Opportunity
summary: Revokes executive orders promoting DEI, directs contractors to cease DEI activities, advises DoEd on compliance with SCOTUS rulings.
notes: Will roll out over the next couple months.

lawsuits.caseName: National Association of Diversity Officers in Higher Education et al. v. Trump et al.

name: Designation Of Ansar Allah as a Foreign Terrorist Organization
summary: Re-designates the Houthis as a terrorist organization.
notes: Will be implemented within the next month.
